text: Richard Olav Jensen (born 17 March 1996) is a Finnish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Roda JC Kerkrade in the Dutch Eerste Divisie and has captained the Finland national under-21 football team. Jensen was born in Porvoo, Finland. ==Professional career== Jensen joined FC Twente's youth academy in 2012 from HJK Helsinki. On 20 January 2017, he signed his first professional contract with Twente for three years.https://svenska.yle.fi/artikel/2017/01/28/broderna-jensen-forlangde-med- fc-twente Exactly a year later, on 20 January 2018, he made his professional debut for Twente in a 1–1 Eredivisie tie with Roda JC Kerkrade. ==International career== Jensen is a youth international for Finland at various youth levels. ==Personal life== Jensen's younger brother, Fredrik Jensen is also a professional footballer at FC Augsburg. ==References== ==External links== * Roda JC Kerkrade official profile * * * * Kicker.de Profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Porvoo Category:Association football central defenders Category:Finnish footballers Category:Finland under-21 international footballers Category:Finland youth international footballers Category:FC Twente players Category:Roda JC Kerkrade players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Tweede Divisie players Category:Finnish expatriate footballers Category:Finnish expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands
title: Richard Jensen (Finnish footballer)
